nodes.text: Starchaser IV was a Wayfarer-class medium transport that was owned by Cularin Star Tours during the Clone Wars.

When Janvar Jan formed Cularin Star Tours, a company that hired luxury yachts to tourists in the Cularin system, he purchased Starchaser IV to serve as a safety ship to protect them, to satisfy his insurers. A crew from Naboo was due to fly it, but when they failed to arrive, Jan hired the Heroes of Cularin to fly the Starchaser for a few days. They flew it around the Cularin system, dealing with various problems that the luxury yachts were experiencing.
